# Contributing Guidelines

*Pull requests, bug reports, and all other forms of contribution are welcomed and highly encouraged!* :octocat:

## Code of Conduct

Please review the [Code of Conduct](https://github.com/derpenstiltskin/connectwise-powerbi/.github/blob/main/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md). It is in effect at all times. We expect it to be honored by everyone who contributes to this project.
